verses.verse: <S%G1722>At<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5076>tetrarch<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G189>fame<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3816>unto<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3816>servants<s%>, <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist<s%>; <S%G846>he<s%> is <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223%G99999>therefore<s%> mighty <S%G1411>works<s%> do show forth <S%G1754>themselves<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> had laid hold <S%G2902>on<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>, and <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5087>put<s%> him <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G2266>Herodias<s%>' sake, <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%>'s <S%G1135>wife<s%>.
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, It <S%G1832>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for <S%G4671>you<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2309>when<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> would <S%G2309>have<s%> put him to <S%G615>death<s%>, he <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G2192>counted<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G4396>prophet<s%>.

But <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%>'s <S%G1077>birthday<s%> was <S%G71>kept<s%>, the <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of <S%G2266>Herodias<s%> <S%G3738>danced<s%> <S%G1722>before<s%> <S%G3319>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G700>pleased<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%>.
<S%G3606>Whereupon<s%> he <S%G3670>promised<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> an <S%G3727>oath<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437>she<s%> would <S%G154>ask<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4264>she<s%>, being before instructed <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G5346>said<s%>, <S%G1325>Give<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G910>Baptist<s%>'s <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> a <S%G4094>platter<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> was <S%G3076>sorry<s%>: <S%G1161>nevertheless<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3727>oath<s%>'s sake, <S%G2532>and<s%> them which sat with him at <S%G4873>food<s%>, he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> it to be given <S%G1325>her<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%>, and <S%G607>beheaded<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5438>prison<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> was <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> a <S%G4094>platter<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G2877>girl<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G5342>brought<s%> it <S%G3384>to<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%>, and took <S%G142>up<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2290>buried<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>went<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G2532>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G402>it<s%>, he departed <S%G1564>there<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117%G99999>place<s%> <S%G2398>apart<s%>: and <S%G2532>when<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%> there they <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> on <S%G3979>foot<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G1831>forth<s%>, and <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> was moved with <S%G4697>compassion<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G732>sick<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when it <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3798>evening<s%>, <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, This <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5610>time<s%> <S%G3928>is<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G3928>past<s%>; <S%G630>send<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G630>away<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G59>may<s%> <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>villages<s%>, and <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1033>food<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2192>They<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G565>depart<s%>; <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5602%G99999>here<s%> <S%G1487%G99999>but<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fish<s%>.
He <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G5342>Bring<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> to sit <S%G347>down<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5528>grass<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G740>the<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2486>the<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fish<s%>, and looking <S%G308>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, he <S%G2127>blessed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2806>broke<s%>, and <S%G1325>gave<s%> the <S%G740>loaves<s%> <S%G3101>to<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitude<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G5315>did<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G5526>filled<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they took <S%G142>up<s%> of the <S%G2801>fragments<s%> that <S%G4052>remained<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> they that had <S%G2068>eaten<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> five <S%G4000>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men<s%>, <S%G5565>beside<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3813>sons<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>directly<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G315>constrained<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G1684>get<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>boat<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to go <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the other <S%G4008>side<s%>, <S%G2193%G99999>while<s%> he <S%G630>sent<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G630>away<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G630>sent<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G630>away<s%>, he went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735%G99999>mountain<s%> <S%G2398>apart<s%> to <S%G4336>pray<s%>: and <S%G1161>when<s%> the <S%G3798>evening<s%> was <S%G1096>come<s%>, he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3441>alone<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, <S%G928>tossed<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> <S%G2949>waves<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1727>contrary<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> in the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G5438>watch<s%> of the <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>.

And <S%G2532>when<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, they were <S%G5015>troubled<s%>, <S%G3754>saying<s%>, It <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G5326>spirit<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they cried <S%G2896>out<s%> <S%G575>for<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2112>directly<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Be of good <S%G2293>cheer<s%>; it <S%G1510>is<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%>; <S%G5399>be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5399>afraid<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G1488>be<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%>, <S%G2753>bid<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G2064>Come<s%>. And <S%G2532>when<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>out<s%> of the <S%G4143>boat<s%>, he <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%>, to <S%G2064>go<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> when he <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2478>boisterous<s%>, he was <S%G5399>afraid<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G756>beginning<s%> to <S%G2670>sink<s%>, he <S%G2896>cried<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> stretched <S%G1614>forth<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%>, and <S%G1949>caught<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, O you of little <S%G1519>faith<s%>, <S%G5101>why<s%> did you <S%G1365>doubt<s%>?
<S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G1684>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%>, the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2869>ceased<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> they that <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Of a <S%G230>truth<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> when they were gone <S%G1276>over<s%>, they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G1082>Gennesaret<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3870>begged<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G680>might<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> the <S%G2899>hem<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garment<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G680>touched<s%> were made perfectly <S%G1295>whole<s%>.
